description:
Add a cleaver to your EDC. If you were to ask most people to draw a pocket knife, they probably wouldn’t draw a this, but the Trunk isn’t your average pocket knife. With its burly G10 handle, stout blade and a deep-carry clip, this is solid option for EDC and outdoor use.

  • Cleaver style blade excels at everyday tasks and maintains full spine thickness all the way to the tip for added strength
  • 7Cr17MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Liner locking mechanism is reliable and easy to use
  • Compact guard helps keep fingers safe
  • Deep jimping provides a natural anchor point for your thumb
  • Durable G10 handle is shaped for secure grip in all conditions
  • Deep-carry clip tucks your knife discretely out of the way
name: Buck Trunk Knife
